attributes.action: Stop closure of monklands a and e dept
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this to stop this happening
attributes.background:
... Monklands A&E is being downgraded as they are taking away orthopaedic surgery... They will tell you casualty will still be fully functional but this is not true.  Everyone please email Alex Neil asap 
Please do this Now for a chance to save it

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
